Text:
The EU is directly targeting American tech companies, favoring European firms, & doing nothing to contain Chinese/Russian companies with its proposed Digital Markets Act. 

@POTUS needs to demand changes to this bill so American companies can compete fairly on the global stage. https://t.co/c0NjaADTa1

Our country can’t succeed without our caregivers. 
 
That’s why #CareCantWait 👇 https://t.co/hoOY3akLH4
That’s why I'm urging @SecretaryPete & @USDOT to improve safety & #ProtectWomenDrivers by requiring female crash test dummies in all vehicle safety reviews.
Women are at a significantly greater risk of injury & death in car accidents than men, but the lack of inclusive test dummies limits testing on how crashes can harm women. https://t.co/6wk6DE54PW

W/ the bipartisan infrastructure law, we’re making critical investments in building climate-resilient infrastructure across our communities. 

We must continue to #ActOnClimate with provisions that will lower emissions & help limit the effects of climate change.
B/c of the #ClimateCrisis, coastal communities will see an unprecedented rise in sea levels over the next 3 decades. https://t.co/pczGLPw9I4

Only 2 more weeks left for flood survivors in Skagit & Whatcom counties to apply for federal flood assistance thru @FEMARegion10 after the historic flooding in November.  

Here are 3️⃣ ways for residents & businesses to apply: https://t.co/5m06536gKj

Celebrate this #PresidentsDay by taking a trip to our @BLMNational & @ForestServiceNW trails & parks! 
 
It’s a fee-free day, so all can enjoy our nation’s precious wildlife & public lands. https://t.co/Rnhw8OYc7f

🎉 Under @POTUS’ leadership, we’ve created over 345K manufacturing jobs nationwide & nearly 8K here in WA!

We’re keeping up the momentum w/ critical investments in American infrastructure & supply chains thru the bipartisan infrastructure law & House-passed #AmericaCOMPETES Act.

80 years ago, the federal government stripped 120K Japanese Americans of their property, livelihoods, & rights b/c of their heritage.
 
This #DayOfRemembrance, we must recommit ourselves to protecting the civil rights of all & rooting out bigotry & hate.
We need concrete solutions to our child care crisis like investing in our child care workforce & making care more affordable for all.

Expanding access to affordable, high-quality child care goes hand in hand w/ strengthening our economic recovery. Many families cannot afford child care or live in child care deserts, which is resulting in primarily women being pushed out of the workforce. https://t.co/fBaWdQ7DKt

The transformative bipartisan infrastructure law is delivering millions of dollars to Amtrak Cascades for new train equipment, including 8 new train cars & 2 locomotives, that will help strengthen our PNW rail network & improve service 🚂

Excited to work with our state leaders to ensure that the funds from the historic bipartisan infrastructure law create more good-paying jobs & build the infrastructure of the future thru the state’s #MoveAheadWA transportation package! https://t.co/jj1MnoQ88Z

Federal grants are important resources for nonprofits, local gov'ts, businesses, & community groups. 
 
My office is hosting a Federal Grants Workshop w/ @grantsdotgov on 3/3 at 12PM for WA-01 orgs interested in learning more.
 
Email Events.DelBene@mail.house.gov to RSVP by 3/1. https://t.co/lMRomZxZtr

The bipartisan infrastructure law is already making broadband more affordable for 10M households, including 160K+ in WA, thru the Affordable Connectivity Program!

Find out if you qualify for a monthly discount & enroll by 📞 at 877-384-2575 or online at https://t.co/TWBPmdktlW
In today’s @WaysMeansCmte, we discussed how the bipartisan infrastructure law will build & strengthen flood & climate resiliency across our communities 👇 https://t.co/nBjeBzYicN
Because of climate change, natural disasters, like flooding, will continue to intensify & cost our country billions of dollars in damages every year.

Happy 2️⃣5️⃣th anniversary to my amazing husband, Kurt!! 
 
Looking forward to many more years & adventures to come! https://t.co/Za0JnIswaD
By strengthening the Housing Credit, we could build/preserve an est. 2M+ affordable housing units nationwide over the next decade.

The demand for housing in WA & the Seattle area is making it very difficult for middle & lower-income families to find an affordable place to call home.  
 
I’m pushing for smart policy that will help us address our affordable housing crisis. 
https://t.co/k2B7anQAPA
Sending love & appreciation to all our veterans in WA-01 & across the country, this #ValentinesDay! https://t.co/soCBGOP5Xl

⏰ For those in Skagit & Whatcom who were affected by Nov. flooding, the deadline to apply for federal @FEMARegion10 & @SBAgov disaster assistance is MARCH 7.

There are several ways for you to apply & resources to help! 

Visit my website for more info: https://t.co/ISpN9zJAa8

This year, I earned a 💯+ on @HSLegFund’s 2021 #HumaneReportCard for advocacy & leadership on animal welfare issues!
 
I am committed to continuing this work in 2022. 
https://t.co/I1rFMeBRHy

Huge congrats to Redmond’s Katie Hensien who had a strong showing in Olympic slalom this week, repping #TeamUSA & WA!! ⛷️ 
https://t.co/hI1yIkBabl
Pleased that over $29M of Wildlife & Sport Fish Restoration grants are heading to WA to support state recreation & conservation projects, thanks to the bipartisan infrastructure law.
WA is home to unparalleled outdoor recreation & precious wildlife. It’s important that we protect & restore WA’s habitat so generations to come can enjoy these resources.
I continue to demand a formal apology & for structural reforms that will help ensure an incident like this does not happen again.

It’s entirely unacceptable that the @CBP has not issued a public apology after the wrongful January 2020 detention of Iranian Americans at the Peace Arch border crossing.  
https://t.co/HUyKXA4Kh4
This is part of a more than $70M investment in electric vehicles over the next 5 years that WA will receive thru the bipartisan infrastructure law!
Nearly $10.5M is headed to WA state this year to build electric vehicle charging stations, which will help create good-paying jobs & #ElectrifyAmerica ⚡ https://t.co/2a2Cxucamg
@SenatorCantwell, @RepDerekKilmer, & I are calling on @SBAgov to ensure these businesses can access Small Business Administration loans & resources now & in the future. https://t.co/Q1wtDCYNBf
Tribal small businesses, including many Lummi Nation treaty fishermen, suffered from #COVID19’s impact but were unable to access federal relief like other small businesses.

If Nov. flooding caused you to lose work or wages, you may be eligible for @ESDwaWorks Disaster Unemployment Assistance.  
 
❗ Be sure to apply for regular unemployment and disaster unemployment at the same time. 
 
For more info, visit: https://t.co/XqqT7jXZJt

Prior auth needs reform. New @AmerMedicalAssn data shows that this antiquated practice delays care, worsens outcomes, & is a burden on seniors & their families. 

It's time to pass my bill that has bipartisan majority support in the House to deliver better care to seniors.

Glad that the IRS will not implement its facial recognition requirement, which has raised significant privacy concerns & would add new barriers to accessing tax assistance.

I support modernizing the IRS, but technology should be secure & easy to use. https://t.co/iKTLd7MV6l

Congressional staffers are public servants & like any workers, they should have the right to organize.    
 
I’m supporting an effort to allow staffers to join a union & have a voice in their workplace.

Human rights abuses & state-sanctioned violence against the LGBTQ+ community are on the rise around the world.

By passing the Global Respect Act, we can send a clear message that hate has no place here or anywhere by sanctioning individuals & nations who commit these abuses. https://t.co/SM47kxtDJi
I voted today to pass the Postal Service Reform Act of 2022, which includes commonsense solutions to save USPS money & will in turn help strengthen mail service across the country.
The reality is that the @USPS isn't serving Americans & its workers as well as it should & risks running out of cash by 2024.

The deadline for Whatcom & Skagit residents to apply for federal flood assistance is MARCH 7. You can apply by:

1️⃣ Visiting https://t.co/I5fk6pBHeJ or 1 of the Disaster Recovery Centers
2️⃣ Calling 800-621-3362
3️⃣ Using the FEMA mobile app

For more info: https://t.co/ISpN9zK7ZG

A new @FEMARegion10 & @waEMD Disaster Recovery Center in Hamilton will be open to those who were impacted by Nov. flooding: 

📍 951 Pettit Street 
Hamilton, WA 98255 

This center will be open this Thursday - Saturday, 10AM - 6PM to help navigate federal assistance.

On #SaferInternetDay, I’m joining @RepSusanWild to demand that @YouTube remove harmful videos that could encourage suicide.

We need to cultivate a safer internet for our kids & this is one simple yet potentially life-saving action that must be taken.

The fight for the #ChildTaxCredit isn't over. 

I joined my fellow #ChildTaxCredit champions @rosadelauro, @SenatorBennet, @SenSherrodBrown, @SenBooker & @SenatorWarnock today to highlight the importance of continuing this historic tax cut. https://t.co/C0SWaOD6Qj
@NewDemCoalition will keep fighting for legislation that puts American workers & families first.

Last week, the House passed the #AmericaCOMPETESAct to strengthen our supply chains, bolster domestic production of chips, ease inflationary pressures, & ensure that the U.S. remains a global leader in research & manufacturing. https://t.co/egoNfFAhWE

Forced arbitration clauses hide in terms & conditions & deny survivors of workplace sexual assault or harassment their day in court.
 
I am voting to pass the #EndingForcedArbitration Act to support survivors & ensure they can seek justice.

The decade-long ban on shellfish trade between the U.S. & E.U. has been a significant barrier to WA shellfish growers, who used to export hundreds of thousands of pounds of shellfish to the E.U./year.
 
This agreement is welcome news for our shellfish industry & regional economy! https://t.co/FbkVZRVvtb

This decision will strengthen the North American solar supply chain, encourage Canadian investment in U.S. solar manufacturing, & help meet the growing demand for clean energy!  
https://t.co/Li1RV9v43m

I called on the Biden admin to take these actions last year in a letter w/ @RepRickLarsen & @PattyMurray. 
https://t.co/4q7Gd11kQv

Right now, the U.S. can’t meet the current demand for solar production domestically. 
 
Pleased that the Biden admin has decided to ease import restrictions on solar cells & pursue negotiations to remove tariffs on Canadian solar panels.
The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law is making long overdue investments in improving broadband access & affordability across our state & Tribal lands. This @FCC task force will play a key role.

Congratulations to Teresa Taylor of the Lummi Nation who was just appointed to the @FCC Native Nations Communications Task Force to help modernize communication services on Tribal lands!   
https://t.co/uCnJ5vhA69
The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law includes the largest ever federal investment in public transit to help modernize & expand our public transit systems.

People of color & low-income communities are less likely to own cars & more likely to live further away from their workplace.
 
#TransitEquity is critical to ensuring our public transit remains reliable, affordable, green, & safe.
Today, we are going one step further by passing the #AmericaCOMPETES Act in the House to help strengthen supply chains, create good-paying jobs, & lower costs for families.

👏 Nearly half a million jobs in one month—this truly is the Biden Boom!

The jobs report today is a reminder of what we can accomplish if we continue investing in American workers & families. https://t.co/2iSVLt5iUX

On #WorldCancerDay, it’s important that we continue to push for increased cancer research, awareness, & care for patients & survivors.

Thankful that the Biden admin has committed to the Cancer Moonshot initiative w/ the goal of halving cancer deaths by 2047. https://t.co/EgDKTryBvS

This is truly a golden opportunity for Congress to act on issues that are plaguing our country.

The House advanced the America COMPETES Act to help strengthen domestic manufacturing, secure our supply chains, & invest in American competitiveness for years to come.

Protecting consumer data privacy needs to be a national priority.  
 
We must be focusing on finally delivering a federal data privacy standard to protect every American. 
https://t.co/V01c5RIUIp

The #AmericaCOMPETES Act is about creating jobs, fortifying our supply chains, & investing in American competitiveness & innovation. 

@NewDemCoalition is working to get this bill across the finish line to tackle the issues our country is facing today & build a strong future.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law will help improve climate resiliency across our communities, but it’s crucial that we continue to take additional bold #ClimateAction to lower carbon emissions & transition to a green economy. 
https://t.co/c9JSJEJ3ih

Climate change is intensifying flooding & it is expected to get worse if we don’t take action now. 
 
The cost of flooding across our country is expected to jump to $40.6B/year by 2050.  https://t.co/GpP8quvWYS

WA is getting closer to 💯 every day! 
 
If you haven’t received your vaccine or are ready for your booster, check out @WADeptHealth’s Vaccine Locator at https://t.co/KF8ScpTiPZ OR call 833-829-4357 to make your appt today. https://t.co/lds3GPRj07
I’m calling on USPS PMG DeJoy to immediately scrap these plans.

The proposed consolidation of the Redmond @USPS mail processing facility could slow mail delivery for nearly 1M residents in King & Snohomish counties.

We should be expanding mail capacity in our growing region, not shrinking it.
https://t.co/qWflLHuXCB

#BlackHistoryMonth is a celebration of Black Americans who have shaped our country for the better.
 
It is also a time to reckon with our long history of injustices & recommit ourselves to doing all we can to secure equality & justice for all.
 
Black history is American history. https://t.co/otcTUJpCFD

Gun violence has left a mark on countless communities across our country. 
 
Our work to support gun violence survivors goes hand in hand with helping end this epidemic by fighting for commonsense solutions.
 
#GVSurvivorsWeek https://t.co/nHylHkMy4Q
Wishing all celebrating #LunarNewYear a healthy, happy, & prosperous #YearOfTheTiger! https://t.co/naNwO2OKcC
❗ These tests are in addition to the 4 free tests available thru https://t.co/UH7CGOixMs.
The Say Yes! COVID Test portal has reopened & WA households can order up to 5 rapid at-home tests online at https://t.co/JLWKwkm4uF or call the @WADeptHealth #COVID19 Hotline at 800-525-0127.
We need to enhance & expand #SocialSecurity benefits with legislation like @RepJohnLarson’s #Secure2100 Act.

5M #SocialSecurity beneficiaries receive below-poverty-level checks every month.  
 
That's unacceptable. 
 
We’ve come a long way since the 1st Social Security check was issued on this day in 1940 & we must make sure that this vital program serves our seniors.

My proposed national data privacy standard would provide a comprehensive solution that protects consumers wherever they are connecting from in the U.S. 
https://t.co/Y686tmVJPB

We need federal data privacy legislation to set the rules of the road for companies like these. 
 
American consumers should have control over their personal data & understand how their information may be used if they agree to the terms & conditions: https://t.co/Cew3lyAnHX

N95 & KN95 masks are better at preventing #COVID19.  
 
The Biden admin is delivering 400M N95 masks for Americans across the country.  
 
These free masks will be available at participating WA pharmacies this week: https://t.co/TSBF4amKsR

Our fight for pay equity & protections from wage discrimination continues 13 years after the Lilly Ledbetter Fair Pay Act was signed into law by President Obama.

While we celebrate this anniversary, we must keep up our calls for the #PaycheckFairness Act & #EqualPayForEqualWork.

Disaster Recovery Centers, staffed by @fema & SBA specialists, have helped make it easier for Skagit & Whatcom flood victims to access federal aid.

I visited the Sedro-Woolley site this week to get an update on recovery efforts.
 
More on what to know: https://t.co/J3jnJOW7xx

The expanded #ChildTaxCredit “being a disincentive to work” is the furthest thing from the truth. 

W/ the rising price of child care, food, & other goods, monthly payments were *helping* parents get to work & afford essentials. 
https://t.co/AYbZc1SBZ6

1 year ago, the Biden admin rescinded the #GlobalGagRule that blocks funding for international groups that offer abortion counseling or referral.

Now, it’s time for Congress to do its part so future presidents can't threaten the #ReproHealth of millions around the world. https://t.co/gro8nmkMnY

A RECORD-BREAKING 240K Washingtonians signed up for 2022 @WAPlanfinder coverage!

With #AmericanRescuePlan insurance subsidies, nearly 3/4 of customers are benefiting from monthly savings. I've been fighting to extend these subsidies so access to quality health care can continue.
The bipartisan infrastructure law is going to help bring our region’s infrastructure into the 21st century. 🌉
Another productive meeting w/ local gov’t officials today to discuss infrastructure needs & high-impact projects across Snohomish Co. from roads & water to broadband access. https://t.co/qNUJQDh6wH

This week, at the Trooper Sean M. O’Connell Jr. Memorial Bridge, @RepRickLarsen, local officials, & I discussed the impact that $605M+ in funding for our bridges will have on our region. 
 
This is a historic investment that I am excited to help deliver to our community. https://t.co/5tG4QRbNA2
As the Chair of the @NewDemCoalition, I am working to deliver strong legislation that will bolster manufacturing & innovation at home while delivering for our communities.

The global short supply of semiconductors—computer chips found in most consumer electronics & vehicles—are driving up the prices for these goods. 
 
The America COMPETES Act includes a critical $52B to strengthen domestic manufacturing of semiconductors. 
https://t.co/tmOeRLFOsG
We must recommit ourselves to #NeverForget & fight against hatred & xenophobia, at a time when our country is witnessing a disturbing increase in antisemitic attacks.

Today, we reflect on one of the darkest chapters in human history as we remember the 6M+ Jewish lives & millions of others violently taken during the Holocaust. 

You can join @HolocaustMuseum in commemorating #HolocaustRemembranceDay at 3PM PT/6PM ET: 
https://t.co/b0VYMXOYzj

🎉 Biden’s economic plan is working!

We need to build on this growth by passing legislation that will continue creating more jobs, curb inflation, & set our workers & families up for success. https://t.co/ucS3wNxPGI

If you have kids under 18, chances are that you’re eligible to claim the rest of your expanded #ChildTaxCredit this tax season. 
 
Check out https://t.co/yb5G8p6liB to learn more & make sure you get your full #ChildTaxCredit ⬇️ 
https://t.co/oUZuntKdeb

Great to meet w/ local officials from across King County to discuss priority infrastructure projects in our communities. 
 
As bipartisan infrastructure law funding is rolled out, our city gov’ts will play a key role in identifying local projects that need investment. https://t.co/XlX3INGgDc

After @USPS’ failure to provide reasonable justification for this action, I called on @USPS PMG DeJoy today to scrap his plans & invited him to visit the facility to understand how important it is to our growing region. https://t.co/ePN9QT5aig

Consolidating the Seattle East DDC mail processing facility in Redmond would cause more unacceptable mail delays across King & Snohomish counties. 
https://t.co/rgHcAmyQps

In just 6 months, #ChildTaxCredit payments helped cut family food insufficiency by a quarter. 
 
This benefit was helping keep families afloat & Congress must find a path forward for this historic program.
Today @RepRickLarsen & I, together with local officials, highlighted the over $605M in federal infrastructure funding to restore & rebuild WA bridges 🚧 https://t.co/ylbqG6gbiI
Our region’s bridges, like the I-5/Trooper Sean M. O'Connell Jr. Memorial Bridge, serve as vital links between our communities & we need to bring them into the 21st century.
It'll take time for our communities to rebuild, & these recovery sites are going to play a crucial role. https://t.co/lEZWDLdbKt

I toured the Sedro-Woolley Disaster Recovery Center today & am grateful to @fema, @SBAgov, & state agency reps. that are helping flood survivors & business owners access federal aid after the historic Nov. flooding. https://t.co/QatuSXFbTo

Catch @RepRickLarsen, local officials, & me as we talk about critical bipartisan infrastructure law investments headed to WA that will help build & revitalize our bridges!

Watch live from the Trooper Sean M. O'Connell Jr. Memorial Bridge in Mount Vernon 👇https://t.co/hDuodHE2sm

Investing in our kids has incredible long-term benefits. 

This study underlines the profound impact that smart investments, like the expanded #ChildTaxCredit, can have in setting our kids up for success over the course of their lives. 
https://t.co/4doNsPJU8F
Congress must come together to pass funding to catalyze new semiconductor investments in the U.S. for years to come.
These chips are also at the heart of some of our biggest supply chain issues today & it’s important that we take steps to strengthen our domestic manufacturing capacity.
Semiconductors are critical inputs for WA state industries like trucks, autos, airplanes, medical devices, emerging tech, & much more.

📣 The 2022 tax season starts today! 
 
As you prepare your tax documents & get ready for the April 18 deadline, make sure to check out these top 5️⃣ tips from the IRS: https://t.co/dbV4eVBPLS
I am excited to welcome this grant as we continue to fight for expanded & protected access to reproductive health care.
This week, @HHS announced that @WADeptHealth has been awarded an #AmericanRescuePlan grant of $750K to help strengthen Title X family planning services across the state.

As threats to reproductive health care & abortion access continue daily, the anniversary of Roe v. Wade must be a call for action.  
 
36M Americans could lose access to safe abortion if SCOTUS reverses Roe.  
 
It’s time for the Senate to pass the Women’s Health Protection Act. https://t.co/W7DatCzpd2

Having trouble or need assistance placing your order for at-home #COVID19 tests? 
 
You can call 📞1-800-232-0233 (TTY 1-888-720-7489) to request your test kits! 
https://t.co/FlsR8rrzj3

📍 461 Second Street 
Sumas, WA 98295 
 
📍 1208 E. Main Street 
Everson, WA 98247

Monday thru Saturday, 9AM – 8PM 
Sundays, 12PM – 6PM 
 
📍 802 Ball Street 
Sedro-Woolley, WA 98284

.@waEMD & @FEMARegion10 have set up Disaster Recovery Centers in Whatcom & Skagit for those impacted by Nov. flooding.

These centers will be staffed by recovery specialists from FEMA, @SBAgov, & state agencies to assist residents & business owners as they apply for assistance 🧵

There shouldn't be a cost barrier to lifesaving prescription medications but according to new data, 3.5M seniors have difficulty affording prescription drugs.
 
We need to confront this affordability crisis w/ meaningful drug pricing reform like what we’ve advanced in the House.

As families prepare for the 2022 tax season, watch out for a letter from the IRS that will help you claim the second half of your expanded #ChildTaxCredit.  
 
Here’s more on what you need to know 👇 
https://t.co/gwexAt8XQc
By automatically enrolling our servicemembers for @DeptVetAffairs benefits, we can help ensure our veterans have consistent access to high-quality care & no one slips thru the cracks.
I voted today to pass the #EVEST Act to make it easier for our veterans to transition out of the military.

As we continue to fight this virus today, there is no better way to support our communities & protect yourself than getting your #COVID19 vaccine & booster. 
 
Visit @WADeptHealth’s Vaccine Locator to find an appointment near you: https://t.co/yXDOa37ORi

It’s been 2 years since the first U.S. case of #COVID19 was found in WA-01. 
 
We mourn the thousands of Washingtonians & over 800K Americans who we have lost to the pandemic.

N95 & KN95 masks offer the best protection from #COVID19 & the Omicron variant. That’s why the Biden admin is making 400M N95 masks available at pharmacies & community health centers across the country.

More info to come about how to get yours 😷
https://t.co/BlozJzCsCo
Remember to #MaskUp & if you haven’t gotten your booster or vaccine yet, visit https://t.co/yXDOa37ORi to find an appt.

#COVID19 hospitalizations in Washington continue to rise.

While there are signs that Omicron cases are peaking, hospitalizations can follow weeks later, further straining our health care system.

The #FightForVotingRights shouldn’t be partisan or in question. 
 
It’s time for the Senate to pass the #FreedomToVote Act & John R. Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act.

There is no denying that climate change is here. We're seeing its consequences every day in higher temps and more frequent & extreme natural disasters. 
 
Our country needs to be accountable & take #ClimateAction for our kids & generations to come.
https://t.co/kQPKoPa8CX

It’s quick & easy to request your FREE #COVID19 at-home test kits.

These rapid antigen tests are part of the Biden admin’s efforts to expand accessibility to COVID-19 testing.

Order your test kits & learn about other resources available to you here: https://t.co/iMTUtfhOYH

In celebration of Martin Luther King, Jr. Day, I went to Kirkland & Redmond to plant trees & join community volunteers to clean up two of our local parks!  
 
What are you doing on this day of service? https://t.co/EsXNXeA3rU

Martin Luther King, Jr.’s service & sacrifice is a constant reminder for us all to stand up & speak out for what is right.

The #FightForVotingRights continues in the Senate chamber this week & we must honor his legacy by building a more equitable & just future for all Americans.

ATTN: Business owners in Skagit & Whatcom impacted by Nov. 2021 flooding can now apply for @SBAgov physical disaster & economic injury assistance.

Economic injury assistance is also available to qualifying Snohomish Co. businesses.

📅 Some great opportunities ahead this year to enjoy our beautiful state & @waDNR parks at no cost! 
 
Discover Pass Free Days help ensure that everyone can access our state parks & recreation. https://t.co/8sOO0l737m

🚨 If you're looking for health care, today is YOUR LAST DAY to sign up for coverage starting Feb. 1 thru @WAplanfinder.
 
Thanks to the #AmericanRescuePlan, plan premiums are more affordable. Don’t miss out & #GetCovered by midnight! 
 
➡️ https://t.co/ad5LORKUQF

Here are 3 ways that families & residents can apply: https://t.co/gw5264f4ZL

So many of our bridges in WA need immediate attention & repair.  
 
@USDOT announced today that WA will receive $605.1M thru the bipartisan infrastructure law over the next 5 years to repair & rebuild critical bridges—a historic investment for our state & our country. https://t.co/AiY3btzOtL
I’m committed to delivering for American families by finding a way to renew this historic tax cut. https://t.co/dyqJSPay1z

Few federal programs have had such a direct & demonstrable impact on Americans as the expanded #ChildTaxCredit.

For the 1st time in 6 months, 36M parents will not be receiving their #ChildTaxCredit payment b/c the Senate failed to act at the end of 2021.
https://t.co/tjjnAVqzqg

WA hospitals & @BloodworksNW are running critically low on blood supply.  
 
If you are healthy & want to donate blood, you can schedule an appointment thru https://t.co/mkcRl5EMh5 or by calling 800-398-7888.
https://t.co/vRrrIGmmh3

The bipartisan infrastructure law will help us achieve universal broadband access by addressing internet affordability. 
 
You can find out if you qualify for up to $30 off your internet bill, or $75 on Tribal or certain rural land at https://t.co/EHdClj668b https://t.co/ZUMzKFh3DQ

Our democracy is under threat.
 
Today, the House advanced combined voting rights legislation that would enact crucial voter protections & strengthen our democracy.
 
Now, it’s the Senate’s turn to act.

The Biden admin is taking action to make sure schools can safely stay open by: 

🎒Providing 5M rapid & 5M PCR tests to schools/month
👩‍👦‍👦 Increasing capacity at free community testing sites for students, staff, & families
🏫Helping schools coordinate w/ #COVID19 testing providers

The National Guard & Reserve servicemembers step up for our communities at a moment’s notice & deserve access to GI Bill benefits.

#EveryDayInUniformCounts, which is why I voted to pass the Guard & Reserve GI Bill Parity Act today.
If you are experiencing symptoms of #COVID19 or have been in close contact with someone who has tested positive, you can find testing locations near you here: https://t.co/wrKcjbo0oR

The pandemic is asking us to all do our part for our health care workers & our community.  
 
If you need a vaccine or booster, visit the @WADeptHealth Vaccine Locator: https://t.co/yXDOa37ORi

Omicron is pushing our hospitals to their limit. 
 
While vaxed & boosted people are having milder cases, the unvaccinated, elderly, & immunocompromised are more likely to be hospitalized. 
https://t.co/O2HWCgBRws
